languages.text: {n}Лицо Ирлиэт каменеет и она отстраняется как можно дальше.{/n} "Наш разговор открыл мне глаза — ты столь же ограничен{mf||а} в понимании моей души, сколь и твои собратья. Закончим на этом. Я не стану более отвлекать повелител{mf|я|ьницу} мон-кай от {mf|его|ее} важных дел".

{n}Yrliet's face hardens and she puts as much distance between you as she can.{/n} "Our conversation has opened my eyes — your understanding of my soul is just as limited as your kin's. Let us stop there. You no doubt have important affairs to attend to. I will not distract the overlord of the mon-keigh any longer."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Ирлиэт каменеет и она отстраняется как можно дальше.{/n} "Наш разговор открыл мне глаза — ты столь же ограничен{mf||а} в понимании моей души, сколь и твои собратья. Закончим на этом. Я не стану более отвлекать повелител{mf|я|ьницу} мон-кай от {mf|его|ее} важных дел".

Let us end this exchange. You no doubt have important affairs to attend to. I will not distract the overlord of the mon-keigh any longer."

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Yrliet se endurece, y se aparta de ti tanto como le resulta posible.{/n} «Nuestra conversación me ha abierto los ojos; tu conocimiento de mi alma es tan limitado como el de tu especie. Dejémoslo ahí. Sin duda tienes asuntos más importantes que atender. No robaré más tiempo al señor supremo de los mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face hardens and she puts as much distance between you as she can.{/n} "Our conversation has opened my eyes — your understanding of my soul is just as limited as your kin's. Let us stop there. You no doubt have important affairs to attend to. I will not distract the overlord of the mon-keigh any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Yrliet se endurece, y se aparta de ti tanto como le resulta posible.{/n} «Nuestra conversación me ha abierto los ojos; tu conocimiento de mi alma es tan limitado como el de tu especie. Dejémoslo ahí. Sin duda tienes asuntos más importantes que atender. No robaré más tiempo al señor supremo de los mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの表情が硬くなり、彼女はできるだけあなたから距離を取ろうとする。{/n}「この会話のおかげで目を開くことができた。我の魂に対する陛下の理解は、その血族と同じように限定的だ。この話は終わりにしよう。陛下もいろいろと忙しいはずだ。モン＝ケイのオーヴァーロードの邪魔をするつもりはない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face hardens and she puts as much distance between you as she can.{/n} "Our conversation has opened my eyes — your understanding of my soul is just as limited as your kin's. Let us stop there. You no doubt have important affairs to attend to. I will not distract the overlord of the mon-keigh any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの表情が硬くなり、彼女はできるだけあなたから距離を取ろうとする。{/n}「この会話のおかげで目を開くことができた。我の魂に対する陛下の理解は、その血族と同じように限定的だ。この話は終わりにしよう。陛下もいろいろと忙しいはずだ。モン＝ケイのオーヴァーロードの邪魔をするつもりはない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}你的话音刚落，伊莉耶特便绷紧了脸，尽可能地拉开了你们的距离。{/n}“与你交谈确实让我大开眼界……看来，你对我的灵魂的看法与你的同类一样狭隘。我们就到此为止吧。想必你还有许多事情需要处理，我就不再打扰猴子们的领主了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face hardens and she puts as much distance between you as she can.{/n} "Our conversation has opened my eyes — your understanding of my soul is just as limited as your kin's. Let us stop there. You no doubt have important affairs to attend to. I will not distract the overlord of the mon-keigh any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话音刚落，伊莉耶特便绷紧了脸，尽可能地拉开了你们的距离。{/n}“与你交谈确实让我大开眼界……看来，你对我的灵魂的看法与你的同类一样狭隘。我们就到此为止吧。想必你还有许多事情需要处理，我就不再打扰猴子们的领主了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Yrliet se ferme tandis qu'elle tente de mettre autant de distance que possible entre vous.{/n} « Notre conversation m'a ouvert les yeux. Vous ne comprenez pas mieux mon âme que vos semblables. Arrêtons-nous ici. Des affaires plus importantes requièrent sans doute votre attention. Je n'importunerai pas plus longtemps {mf|le maître|la maîtresse} des mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face hardens and she puts as much distance between you as she can.{/n} "Our conversation has opened my eyes — your understanding of my soul is just as limited as your kin's. Let us stop there. You no doubt have important affairs to attend to. I will not distract the overlord of the mon-keigh any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Yrliet se ferme tandis qu'elle tente de mettre autant de distance que possible entre vous.{/n} « Notre conversation m'a ouvert les yeux. Vous ne comprenez pas mieux mon âme que vos semblables. Arrêtons-nous ici. Des affaires plus importantes requièrent sans doute votre attention. Je n'importunerai pas plus longtemps {mf|le maître|la maîtresse} des mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Miene verhärtet sich und sie entfernt sich so weit wie möglich von dir.{/n} "Unser Gespräch hat mir die Augen geöffnet — Euer Verständnis meiner Seele ist ebenso beschränkt wie das Eurer gesamten Spezies. Belassen wir es dabei. Es warten gewiss wichtige Angelegenheiten auf Euch. Ich werde {mf|den Herrscher|die Herrscherin} der Chem-Pan-Sey nicht länger ablenken."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face hardens and she puts as much distance between you as she can.{/n} "Our conversation has opened my eyes — your understanding of my soul is just as limited as your kin's. Let us stop there. You no doubt have important affairs to attend to. I will not distract the overlord of the mon-keigh any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Miene verhärtet sich und sie entfernt sich so weit wie möglich von dir.{/n} "Unser Gespräch hat mir die Augen geöffnet — Euer Verständnis meiner Seele ist ebenso beschränkt wie das Eurer gesamten Spezies. Belassen wir es dabei. Es warten gewiss wichtige Angelegenheiten auf Euch. Ich werde {mf|den Herrscher|die Herrscherin} der Chem-Pan-Sey nicht länger ablenken."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in yüzü sertleşiyor, aranıza olabildiğince mesafe koyuyor.{/n} "Bu görüşme gözlerimi açtı. Ruhumu soydaşların kadar sınırlı bir derecede anlayabiliyorsun. Daha fazla ilerlemeyelim. Eminim halletmen gereken önemli işlerin vardır. Mon-keighlerin efendisini daha fazla meşgul etmeyeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face hardens and she puts as much distance between you as she can.{/n} "Our conversation has opened my eyes — your understanding of my soul is just as limited as your kin's. Let us stop there. You no doubt have important affairs to attend to. I will not distract the overlord of the mon-keigh any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in yüzü sertleşiyor ve aranıza olabildiğince mesafe koyuyor.{/n} "Bu görüşme gözlerimi açtı. Ruhumu soydaşların kadar sınırlı bir derecede anlayabiliyorsun. Daha fazla ilerlemeyelim. Eminim ilgilenmen gereken önemli işlerin vardır. Mon-keighlerin efendisini daha fazla meşgul etmeyeyim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
